title: [Large-scale] Interactive Question Insertion Strategy Design for MOOC Lecture Videos

context.prior_knowledge: Core instructional design principles and comprehension of MOOC platforms
context.additional_context: A course to strengthen effective MOOC design competencies for pre-service and in-service teachers in smartphone-centric limited technological environments

learning_goals: Learners can design interactive questions for MOOC lecture videos, categorized into three types: attention engagement, cognitive load reduction, and critical thinking stimulation.
Learners can apply at least two question-insertion strategies suitable for smartphone-based MOOC platforms in constrained technical environments.
Learners can develop more than 10 situation-based interactive questions tailored to the characteristics of language subjects.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
